      • setStdOut

        public void setStdOut(boolean stdOut)
        Set whether to write out updated messages to the standard output
        Parameters:

      • updateLastMessage

        public void updateLastMessage(java.lang.String newMessage,
                              boolean writeOut)
        Update the the Log with a new message. Will be written out to the appropriate channels depending on the settings of the module
        Parameters:
        newMessage - the message to log
        writeOut - true if the message should be written to the log file, and false if not
